item.title: Repost from DanSlott https://twitter.com/DanSlott/statuses/436309971740139520/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Repost from DanSlott https://twitter.com/DanSlott/statuses/436309971740139520/:

RT @DanSlott: My favorite line from #ModernFamily:

“If you love something, set it free. Unless it’s a tiger.”

#Philsosophy

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Lily: Let me see that. (grabs letter, looks at it, then gives it back) I can’t read. #ModernFamily
